channel.title: Help with this error?
channel.description:
[code]Item4.java:3: class Item is public, should be declared in a file named Item.java
public class Item { ^ .\Item4.java:3: class Item is public, should be declared in a file named Item.ja va public class Item { ^ Player.java:743: cannot access Item4 bad class file: .\Item4.java file does not contain class Item4 Please remove or make sure it appears in the correct subdirectory of the classpa th. if (!Item4.isPlate(playerEquipment[playerChest])) { ^ 3 errors Press any key to continue . . .[/code] Useing pimpscape and I cant seen to get silbs items workin

item.title: Help with this error?
item.dc:creator: @Arcanaus Arcanaus
item.description:

public class Item {
^
.\Item4.java:3: class Item is public, should be declared in a file named Item.ja
va
public class Item {
^
Player.java:743: cannot access Item4
bad class file: .\Item4.java
file does not contain class Item4
Please remove or make sure it appears in the correct subdirectory of the classpa
th.
if (!Item4.isPlate(playerEquipment[playerChest])) {
^
3 errors
Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
Useing pimpscape and I cant seen to get silbs items workin
